{"blocks":[{"key":"3quje","text":"Reaction cleanup and quantification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aucts","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7tdal","text":"0.8x SPRIselect cleanup - 80 µL beads in 100 µL PCR reaction from step 2.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"526t0","text":"Elute in 46 µL low-TE","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1gbn","text":"Qubit quantification","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80o7k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erokd","text":"TSO artifact removal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eiljj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25o4u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eofib","text":"Transfer 10 μL (100 μg) resuspended Dynabeads™ kilobaseBINDER™ streptavidin beads to a PCR tube. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60sog","text":"Place the tube on the magnet for 2 min.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5sp8","text":"Carefully remove and discard the supernatant while the tube remains on the magnet. Avoid touching the bead pellet with the pipette tip.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doq48","text":"Remove the tube from the magnet. Add 40 μL Binding Solution along the inside wall of the tube where the beads are collected and gently resuspend by pipetting. Note: the solution may be viscous. Avoid foaming.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9o0er","text":"Place the tube on the magnet for 2 min and remove the supernatant.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"949om","text":"Resuspend the beads in 40 μL Binding Solution.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbv4k","text":"Add 40 μL of a solution containing the biotinylated DNA-fragments to the resuspended beads. Mix carefully to avoid foaming of the solution.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66o90","text":"Incubate the tube at room temperature for 3 hours on a roller to keep the beads in suspension.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qt55","text":"Place the tube on the magnet and remove the supernatant as in step 3, above.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mnmm","text":"Wash the Dynabeads®/DNA-complex 2x in 80 μL Washing Solution and once in distilled water.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qmgk","text":"Resuspend the Dynabeads®/DNA-complex in 40ul Low-TE.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2evkp","text":"Add 2ul USER and incubate in a rotator at 37C for 2 hours.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bibor","text":"Place the tube on the magnet and move the supernatant containing the library to a fresh tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gqq8","text":"Cleanup - 0.8x SPRI (32 µL beads in 40 µL library)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dcku","text":"Elute in 46 µL low-TE.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"799pg","text":"Qubit quantification","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90dgm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bv86n","text":"Reaction cleanup","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p0ki","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0bcb","text":"Pool 15 x 95 µL reactions in 5ml tube. (Note* attaining equimolar amounts of each adapter PCR is key to efficient array assembly - be mindful to add the same amount of each adapter PCR to the pool. To account for handling, 95/100 µL of the PCR is advised to be pooled from each reaction.)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"468bj","text":"SPRIselect cleanup - 0.7x (997.5 µL beads in 1425 µL pooled MAS adapter PCR)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":60,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9ose","text":"Elute in 450 µL low TE buffer.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"obup","text":"Qubit quantify","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c90jk","text":"Move 435 µL of the library to a 1.5 mL microtube tube and added 15 µL of USER enzyme. (Note* 10-15 µg is advised going into this step. Dilute going into this step if sample is too concentrated.)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edvri","text":"Incubate reaction at 37 for 2.5 hours","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4b22e","text":"Add 51 µL Hifi Ligase buffer and 15ul Hifi ligase to the USER reaction.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1eb1k","text":"Distribute to 5x PCR tubes and set in thermocycler at 42C for 2 hours.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89f1k","text":"Pool reaction into a 1.5 mL microtube using a wide bore tip","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5abff","text":"SPRIselect cleanup - 0.7x ( 361.2 µL beads in 516 µL reaction), mix gently with wide bore tip. Set on rotator for 5 min. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dniru","text":"Incubate at 37C for 10min - elute in 180 µL low TE. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c04bm","text":"Qubit quantify ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
